info.name: Garaad Backend API
info.description: A comprehensive collection of all Garaad Backend API endpoints

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Registers a new user and creates onboarding information in a single request.
Authenticates a user and returns tokens.
Get a new access token using a refresh token.

item.description: Endpoints for user authentication, registration, and token management.

request.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile information.
Checks if a user has completed onboarding.
Submit onboarding information for an existing user.
Create a student profile for an authenticated user.
Returns information about available API endpoints.
A simple endpoint that returns 'Hello, World!'

item.name: LMS - Courses

request.description: Returns a list of all published courses with basic information.
Returns detailed information about a specific course, including its modules, lessons, and exercises.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "JavaScript Fundamentals",
  "description": "Learn the core concepts of JavaScript programming.",
  "thumbnail": "https://example.com/js-thumbnail.jpg",
  "level": "beginner",
  "category": "Programming",
  "author_id": "instructor1",
  "is_published": false
}

request.description: Creates a new course.

item.description: Endpoints for managing courses in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - Modules

request.description: Returns a list of all modules.
Returns all modules for a specific course.
Creates a new module for a course.

item.description: Endpoints for managing modules in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - Lessons

request.description: Returns a list of all lessons.
Returns all lessons for a specific module, including their content blocks.
Creates a new lesson for a module.

item.description: Endpoints for managing lessons in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - Lesson Content Blocks

request.description: Returns a list of all content blocks.
Creates a new content block for a lesson.
Reorders content blocks within a lesson.

item.description: Endpoints for managing lesson content blocks in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - Problems

request.description: Returns a list of all problems with their hints and solution steps.

body.raw:
{
  "question_text": "What Python function would you use to get the length of a list?",
  "question_type": "input",
  "options": null,
  "correct_answer": "len()",
  "explanation": "The len() function returns the number of items in a container like a list.",
  "difficulty": "beginner"
}

request.description: Creates a new problem with optional hints and solution steps.

item.name: Add a Hint to a Problem

request.description: Adds a hint to an existing problem.

item.name: Add a Solution Step to a Problem

request.description: Adds a solution step to an existing problem.

item.description: Endpoints for managing problems in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - Practice Sets

request.description: Returns a list of all practice sets.
Creates a new practice set linked to either a lesson or a module.

item.name: Add a Problem to a Practice Set

request.description: Adds a problem to a practice set with a specified order.

item.name: Reorder Problems in a Practice Set

request.description: Reorders problems within a practice set.

item.description: Endpoints for managing practice sets in the Learning Management System.

item.name: LMS - User Progress

request.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's progress across all lessons.
Retrieves the authenticated user's progress across all lessons in a specific course.
Updates the status of a user's progress on a specific lesson.
Marks a lesson as completed for the authenticated user and optionally includes a score.

item.description: Endpoints for tracking user progress through lessons, modules, and courses.

item.name: LMS - Course Enrollment

request.description: Retrieves all courses that the authenticated user is enrolled in.
Enrolls the authenticated user in a course.
Alternative endpoint to enroll the authenticated user in a specific course.

item.description: Endpoints for managing user enrollment in courses.

item.name: LMS - User Rewards

request.description: Retrieves all rewards earned by the authenticated user.

item.description: Endpoints for the user reward and gamification system.

request.description: Retrieves the leaderboard for a specific time period.
Retrieves the authenticated user's rank on the leaderboard for a specific time period.

variable.description: Base URL for the API (change to production URL when needed)
JWT access token for authenticated requests
